mapper.select: SELECT id,userId,sessionId,browseDate,year,week,referer,month,day,hour,minute,pageTitle, pageUrl,stayLong,feature,appName,ip,location,browseType,browseVersion,os,device,remark,createTime ,(select username from bb_user bu where bu.id=userId) username from bb_system_record where id=#{id}

SELECT id,userId,sessionId,browseDate,year,week,referer,month,day,hour,minute,pageTitle, pageUrl,stayLong,feature,appName,ip,location,browseType,browseVersion,os,device,remark,createTime from bb_system_record where userId=#{userId} and sessionId=#{sessionId} and day=#{day} ORDER BY createTime DESC
